Question: I am trying to read lines of text from the console. The number of lines is not known in advance. The BufferedReader.readLine() method reads a line but after the last line it waits for input from the console. What should be done in order to avoid this?
Please using this api: BufferedReader.readLine.
Answer:<<<api>>>: BufferedReader.readLine
<<<code>>>: public static String[] getLinesFromConsole() {
        String strLine = "";
        try {
            // Get the object of DataInputStream
            InputStreamReader isr = new InputStreamReader(System.in);
            BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(isr);
            String line = "";
            while ((line = br.readLine()) != null && !line.equals("exit") )
                strLine += br.readLine() + "~";
                isr.close();                                                        
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();                                
        }
        return strLine.split("~");
    }
